definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: And I couldn’t get Daddy and his confident deathbed prediction that I would win out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我始终想着老爸在临终前确信的预言，他说我会胜出。

sentences.english: The tolerance he that old daddy take into to my bug munificence have gets the man sort.
sentences.chinese: 老爸对我的错误加以宽容，他有着男人般的宽宏大量。

sentences.english: Ex: My father is a hard-nosed man.
sentences.chinese: 我老爸是个严厉的男人。

sentences.english: Gretchen: I don't want to offend your dad, But what if I don't like yellow?
sentences.chinese: 我不想对你老爸没礼貌，但我要是不喜欢黄菜怎么办？

sentences.english: Big Bang Theory" or "How I met your mother".
sentences.chinese: 生活大爆炸》或者《老爸老妈浪漫史》。

sentences.english: Dad was very good at making fried noodles, and a lot of people liked his noodles.
sentences.chinese: 老爸很擅长做炒面，当时很多人都很喜欢他做的面。

sentences.english: Truth be told, my father snored a bit during the address…
sentences.chinese: 说句实在话，我老爸在听演讲时酣然入睡。

sentences.english: No! He resented the old man, so he saws the head off his dad's memorial statue.
sentences.chinese: 没有，他讨厌老爸，甚至锯掉了父亲雕像的脑袋。

sentences.english: Today, I awoke to the sound of my dad knocking on my dorm room door for a surprise visit.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我被我老爸俄然拜访我宿舍的拍门声所吵醒。

sentences.english: Hire a PGA instructor for a series of golf lessons for you and dad.
sentences.chinese: 雇一名职业教练为你和老爸上上高尔夫课。

sentences.english: Dad often gambling, typical kind of money worship, rich prodigal master.
sentences.chinese: 老爸经常赌博，典型的那种无钱拜神，有钱败家的主。

sentences.english: Today, my very overprotective dad finally let my boyfriend stay the night.
sentences.chinese: 今天过分保护我的老爸终于允许男朋友留下来过夜了。

sentences.english: Shd ask e doc not 2 predict when dad can discharge.
sentences.chinese: 该请医生不要预测老爸何时出院。

sentences.english: Today, my dad accidentally texted me a sexual message that was suppose to go to his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我偶然收到一条老爸发给他女友的性感短信。

definition: younger male cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
